caption.p: Distribution of H 2S, organic acid, diffusible pigments and various enzymes producing isolates at the increasing altitudes of the Laohu Ditch. Cat, catalase; Lip 2, lipase 2; Ure, urease; Pro., protease; Lip 3, lipase 3; Amy, amylase; Lip 1, lipase 1; Dp, diffusible pigment; Oa, organic acid.
